Colors & States

Neutral * Disabled Inverted Inv Dis *
Link

You can construct this buttons by adding special classes.
Use the button classes on an <a>, <button>, or <input> element.

<!-- Neutral button --> <button class="button button_type_neutral" type="button">Neutral</button> <!-- Primary button --> <button class="button button_type_primary" type="button">Primary</button> <!-- Success button --> <button class="button button_type_success" type="button">Success</button> <!-- Warning button --> <button class="button button_type_warning" type="button">Warning</button> <!-- Danger button --> <button class="button button_type_danger" type="button">Danger</button> <!-- Link button --> <button class="button button_type_link" type="button">Link</button> <!-- Text button --> <button class="button button_type_text" type="button">Text</button> <!-- Inverted buttons --> <button class="button button_type_neutral-inverted" type="button">Neutral</button> <button class="button button_type_primary-inverted" type="button">Primary</button> <button class="button button_type_success-inverted" type="button">Success</button> <button class="button button_type_warning-inverted" type="button">Warning</button> <button class="button button_type_danger-inverted" type="button">Danger</button> <!-- Disabled state --> <button class="button button_type_neutral disabled" type="button">Neutral</button> <!-- Active state --> <button class="button button_type_neutral active" type="button">Neutral</button>

Sizes

Large

Neutral * Disabled Inverted Inv Dis *

Normal

Small

Extra Small

Full Width Button

You can change the button size by adding size classes.

<!-- Large button --> <button class="button button_type_neutral button_size_lg" type="button">Neutral</button> <!-- Normal button --> <button class="button button_type_neutral" type="button">Neutral</button> <!-- Small button --> <button class="button button_type_neutral button_size_sm" type="button">Neutral</button> <!-- Extra small button --> <button class="button button_type_neutral button_size_xs" type="button">Neutral</button> <!-- Full width button --> <button class="button button_type_neutral button_width_block" type="button">Neutral</button>

Other Modifiers

3D Buttons

Neutral

Rounded Buttons

Pulsating Effect

Zoom Effect

No Min Width

You can change the button state by adding modifier classes.

<!-- 3D buttons --> <button class="button button_type_neutral-3d" type="button">Neutral</button> <button class="button button_type_primary-3d" type="button">Primary</button> <button class="button button_type_success-3d" type="button">Success</button> <button class="button button_type_warning-3d" type="button">Warning</button> <button class="button button_type_danger-3d" type="button">Danger</button> <!-- Rounded button --> <button class="button button_type_neutral button_style_rounded" type="button">Neutral</button> <!-- Pulsating effect --> <button class="button button_type_neutral button_effect_pulsate" type="button">Neutral</button> <!-- Zoom effect --> <button class="button button_type_neutral button_effect_zoom" type="button">Neutral</button> <!-- No min width (compact) --> <button class="button button_type_neutral button_width_compact" type="button">Neutral</button>
